'''And You Call Yourself One of the Four Winds''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to combine a [[Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard]]'s shield with {{Pyro}}, {{Hydro}}, {{Electro}}, and {{Cryo}} before defeating it.
